1.title: Hella Duplicitous
1.plot: The FBI team hunts a dangerous enemy operative, and a deadly new foe emerges.

2.title: My Art Project
2.plot: The entire intelligence community is put in jeopardy when Remi co-opts an FBI case.

3.title: The Quantico Affair
3.plot: Patterson and Rich take the reigns as the FBI team faces an explosive threat.

4.title: Sous-Vide
4.plot: A tattoo puts the team in danger when a deadly disease is released inside the FBI.

5.title: Naughty Monkey Kicks at Tree
5.plot: A blast from Rich's past sends the FBI team after a deadly terrorist plot.

6.title: Ca-ca-Candidate for Cri-cri-Crime
6.plot: The team is drawn into dangerous political intrigue when a tattoo points to someone from Weitz's past.

7.title: Case: Sun, Moon, and the Truth
7.plot: Remi's schemes put her and Weller in danger, while Patterson and Rich solve a mysterious puzzle at the FBI.

8.title: Screech, Thwack, Pow
8.plot: Remi races against the ever-worsening ZIP poisoning to enact her ultimate plan.

9.title: Check Your Ed
9.plot: The team's desperate gambit to get Jane back puts her head-to-head with Remi.

10.title: The Big Reveal
10.plot: Reade confronts Zapata, while the team follows a lead to a potential cure for Jane.

11.title: Careless Whisper
11.plot: The murder of a best-selling true crime novelist sends Jane and the team on a hunt for a serial killer detailed in the author's final manuscript, which also features lightly fictionalized versions of the FBI team.

12.title: The Tale of the Book of Secrets
12.plot: Roman's clues lead to a billionaire hypochondriac with stem cells that could cure Jane, who is now on her deathbed. Patterson and Rich offer to trade the Book of Secrets for the stem cells -- but first they'll have to get it.

13.title: Though This Be Madness, Yet There Is Method In't
13.plot: Jane and Weller's romantic getaway is cut short when the team must stop Madeline Burke's plans to blow up a building and crash a plane that turns out to be more than the average commercial airliner.

14.title: The Big Blast from the Past
14.plot: An active bomber forces the team to delve into a case from their past.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Jane Doe gets discovered and together with a team of FBI agents, they try to discover her past and who she is.

2.title: A Stray Howl
2.plot: A tattoo points to an Air Force pilot with a difficult past; a disturbing memory haunts Jane; Weller believes he knows Jane's identity.

3.title: Eight Slim Grins
3.plot: A member of a jewel heist crew is caught during a robbery & physical evidence shows he has unknown ties to Jane Doe. Someone from her past visits her but is unable to relay any useful information in time.

4.title: Bone May Rot
4.plot: Patterson and her puzzle-expert boyfriend, David decode a tattoo clue that sends the team to the Centers for Disease Control (CDC). While at the CDC, the team discovers a hidden message on Jane's body that uncovers a plot that could have catastrophic global consequences. Meanwhile, Jane and Weller grow closer.

5.title: Split the Law
5.plot: After a seemingly straightforward hostage situation turns out to have deeper international implications, the CIA and FBI find themselves racing against each other to apprehend the same criminal with a dark history. Carter expresses concern about Jane's trustworthiness, causing friction with Mayfair and testing Reade's loyalty to the team. Meeting Weller's family proves overwhelming for Jane as she grapples with her identity.

6.title: Cede Your Soul
6.plot: When an assassination leads the team to a dangerous app that allows criminals to track government vehicles, they have to work with the app's surprising creator to take it down. Jane and Weller attempt to keep their relationship professional. Zapata struggles with a moral issue.

7.title: Sent on Tour
7.plot: One of Jane's tattoos sends the team to a remote location where they find themselves face to face with a dangerous criminal in a case that puts Jane and Weller's strained relationship to the test and threatens to expose Mayfair's secrets. Meanwhile, Patterson breaks the rules to solve a tattoo puzzle.

8.title: Persecute Envoys
8.plot: After a police officer is murdered, Patterson unlocks a disturbing tattoo that appears to have predicted his killing, and the team chases a violent clue trail to stop further attacks. Mayfair reveals secrets from her past to Weller, seriously testing their relationship.

9.title: Authentic Flirt
9.plot: Jane and Weller go undercover as a top-notch assassin couple in order to protect some lethal info. Meanwhile, David tries to repair his relationship with Patterson; and Carter and Mayfair disagree about how to deal with a menacing person.

10.title: Evil Handmade Instrument
10.plot: Sleeper spies get activated and prepare for assassinations so the team rushes to stop them.

11.title: Cease Forcing Enemy
11.plot: Jane reels from a series of massive revelations about her tattoos and grapples with whether to trust Oscar; A tattoo leads the team to a shocking discovery at the Black Sea.

12.title: Scientists Hollow Fortune
12.plot: Weller's team investigate an ex-soldier who starts killing people, even though he's supposed to be dead. Moreover, they find the same drug that was used to wipe out Jane's memory in his system. Jane looks for answers when seeing Oscar.

13.title: Erase Weary Youth
13.plot: After a tip reveals a mole within the FBI, the team must hunt for the operative while facing extreme scrutiny from Inspector Fischer; The team's deepest secrets threatened to be exposed and everyone is a potential suspect.

14.title: Rules in Defiance
14.plot: An anonymous tip leads the team to investigate an urgent death row case, sending Zapata undercover; After nearly getting caught during the mole hunt, Jane considers leaving the FBI.

15.title: Older Cutthroat Canyon
15.plot: After a painting featuring one of Jane's tattoos is heisted from a gallery, the team discovers Jane is the real target. In order to protect her team, Jane goes AWOL.

16.title: Any Wounded Thief
16.plot: After an armored truck is robbed, the team discovers that the stolen goods are chemical weapons and they must race to thwart a terrorist plot. Meanwhile, Jane grapples with a confusing memory of Weller - while growing even closer to Oscar.

17.title: Mans Telepathic Loyal Lookouts
17.plot: After Patterson discovers a hidden message in the New York Times crossword, she embarks on a tattoo scavenger hunt that leads her into danger. Weller seeks his Dad's opinion about who kidnapped Taylor Shaw.

18.title: One Begets Technique
18.plot: Rich Dotcom realizes he will never survive in prison, so he decides to give the FBI the option to capture Shohid Ahtar. The man who finances many of worlds terrorist organisations. But to get to him, the FBI needs to steal some paintings to lure him out.

19.title: In the Comet of Us
19.plot: A shooting takes place on a college campus while the team is investigating one of Jane's tattoos. The team halts their investigation to hunt for the shooter. Meanwhile someone from Mayfair's past resurfaces.

20.title: Swift Hardhearted Stone
20.plot: The team protects a young girl with a tattoo connection and ties to a terrorist organization; Jane is conflicted; Borden and Patterson's friendship starts to bloom.

21.title: Of Whose Uneasy Route
21.plot: Criminal hackers infiltrate the FBI building, causing it to be locked down while the team is trapped inside; personal conflicts ignite as the team members struggle in close quarters.

22.title: If Love a Rebel, Death Will Render
22.plot: The team races to identify an abandoned infant with the same tattoo as Jane.

23.title: Why Await Life's End
23.plot: Weller searches for the truth within a heartbreaking and confounding assertion. And while Jane reaches out to a former suspect for help with Oscar, the rest of the team struggle to help a friend.

1.title: In Night So Ransomed Rogue
1.plot: Jane is recaptured by the CIA and agrees to become a triple-agent.

2.title: Heave Fiery Knot
2.plot: The team races to stop a corrupt DEA agent from selling stinger missiles to a drug cartel as Weller fights to keep everyone together under the increasing pressures of Jane's rift with the others and the uncomfortable addition of Nas as co-leader.

3.title: Hero Fears Imminent Rot
3.plot: Weller and the team must race the clock to stop a series of escalating New York City bombings, while Jane is forced to go on an assassination mission to prove her loyalty...or suffer the consequences.

4.title: If Beth
4.plot: Nas and Weller navigate their new dynamic as co-leaders during the team's hunt for a museum gala assassin, who turns out turns out to be harboring a dark secret; Jane starts to see a softer side of her old organization.

5.title: Condone Untidiest Thefts
5.plot: After a prominent politician is almost killed during a rally, Weller and the team must work with US Marshal Allie Knight (recurring guest star TRIESTE KELLY DUNN) to take down a leader of the Irish Mob.

6.title: Her Spy's Harmed
6.plot: Weller and Nas chase a fugitive whistleblower in Bulgaria; Jane goes on a sandstorm mission with Roman; Reade and Zapata deal with an urgent matter.

7.title: Resolves Eleven Myths
7.plot: Rich Dotcom returns to the FBI when he needs help with a pressing issue.

8.title: We Fight Deaths on Thick Lone Waters
8.plot: Weller and Jane disappear while undercover so the team has to turn to two criminals to figure out what happened; AUSA Weitz comes back to settle a score with the team.

9.title: Why Let Cooler Pasture Deform
9.plot: After Jane discovers that Sandstorm is gearing up for an imminent attack, she risks everything to send a secret SOS to her FBI team.

10.title: Nor I, Nigel, AKA Leg in Iron
10.plot: Patterson is missing and Roman is loose, so Jane and Weller must find them before Shepherd does.

11.title: Droll Autumn, Unmutual Lord
11.plot: After one of the world's most-wanted terrorists surfaces in New York for unknown reasons, the team must partner with the CIA to stop a deadly bombing.

12.title: Devil Never Even Lived
12.plot: When an unusual tattoo leads back to Roman, the team must decide whether to send him into the field...to go undercover with a dangerous biker gang.

13.title: Name Not One Man
13.plot: The team faces a struggle when they find out that Kurt Weller might be working as a double agent without even realizing it himself.

14.title: Borrow or Rob
14.plot: A tattoo points the team to a powerful collegiate secret society, but only Rich Dotcom, one their alumni, can infiltrate it.

15.title: Draw O Caesar, Erase a Coward
15.plot: The team chases down a deadly underworld courier after a set of tattoos produces multiple leads.

16.title: Evil Did I Dwell, Lewd I Did Live
16.plot: Weller and Jane face off against an old foe when they come face to face with Nas's source in Sandstorm.

17.title: Solos
17.plot: Jane and Oliver end up in a dangerous situation that reveals their secrets.

18.title: Senile Lines
18.plot: As the team tries to defend itself against an old rival, a tattoo leads them to a mysterious death at a foster home.

19.title: Regard a Mere Mad Rager
19.plot: Jane and Weller go undercover on a high-stakes scavenger hunt run by powerful hackers. Shepherd journeys to Thailand to procure a dangerous weapon.

20.title: In Words, Drown I
20.plot: Zapata is sent to jail alongside Devon. The team must go to exceptional lengths to help Zapata get out.

21.title: Mom
21.plot: The team finally cracks a member of Sandstorm, leading to a huge breakthrough in uncovering Phase Two.

22.title: Lepers Repel
22.plot: As the FBI copes with a tragedy, Weller finds himself the center of a surprising event. Jane faces an uncertain future.

1.title: Back to the Grind
1.plot: 18 months after parting ways under mysterious circumstances, the FBI team is brought back together by a new crisis.

2.title: Enemy Bag of Tricks
2.plot: As the team adjusts to their new dynamic -- and the new tattoos -- they battle a dangerous foreign power that is trying to hijack a satellite.

3.title: Upside Down Craft
3.plot: While Jane and Weller hunt down a collective of dangerous computer hackers, Patterson and Rich Dotcom must work together to hide an explosive secret from their past.

4.title: Gunplay Ricochet
4.plot: As the team chases a deadly bomber who's terrorizing Manhattan, Jane uncovers a shattering secret from her youth.

5.title: This Profound Legacy
5.plot: While Jane struggles to cope with a secret from her past, the team races to prevent an international crisis.

6.title: Adoring Suspect
6.plot: The team goes under cover on a movie set to stop a terrorist plot with unlikely backers.

7.title: Fix My Present Havoc
7.plot: The team runs a covert operation out of Jane and Weller's apartment.

8.title: City Folks Under Wraps
8.plot: As the team works together to take down a foe, Jane and Weller face a toxic secret that threatens to tear them apart.

9.title: Hot Burning Flames
9.plot: The team must learn to work together again, after much personal strain, to recover some nuclear warheads.

10.title: Balance of Might
10.plot: The team races to thwart a deadly terrorist plot with the help of Reade's journalist girlfriend.

11.title: Technology Wizards
11.plot: While Jane and Weller partner with a mysterious man from Jane's past to find a missing person, the team races to stop an arms deal.

12.title: Two Legendary Chums
12.plot: Weller and his former FBI partner reunite for a dangerous undercover mission while Zapata interrogates a past foe.

13.title: Warning Shot
13.plot: A surprising visit from Nas leads the team to investigate a dangerous piece of technology that was stolen from the NSA. Roman and Blake grow closer as they attend a high-stakes poker game.

14.title: Everlasting
14.plot: When Patterson's tattoo investigation results in a horrible incident, she tries to figure out what went wrong -- but quickly realizes all is not as it seems.

15.title: Deductions
15.plot: The team must decide whether to trust a prisoner who warns them of a dangerous plot. Zapata is caught between the FBI and the CIA. Roman and Crawford argue on handling a volatile situation.

16.title: Artful Dodge
16.plot: A CIA source threatens to tear the team apart. Rich's place in the FBI is called into question. Roman and Crawford spend a day together under strange circumstances.

17.title: Mum's the Word
17.plot: The FBI team and Avery attend a gala hosted by their target Hank Crawford in hopes of arresting him. Roman grows closer to the Crawfords.

18.title: Clamorous Night
18.plot: The team faces a deadly threat on all of their lives. Roman's allegiances are tested.

19.title: Galaxy of Minds
19.plot: The team must partner with a conspiracy theorist to stop a deadly weapon from getting into Crawford's hands. Meanwhile, Roman struggles maintain his personal life with Blake while doing secret missions.

20.title: Let It Go
20.plot: After receiving shocking news about Avery's father, Jane and Weller must hunt down an elusive criminal. Meanwhile, Patterson's father helps the team in the lab.

21.title: Defection
21.plot: Jane is forced to recruit someone from her past to help take down a dangerous alliance.

22.title: In Memory
22.plot: Jane and Weller go on a hunt for Roman back to where it all started.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
Harriman State Park, Bear Mountain, New York, USA::(Seven Lakes Drive)
imdb.plot outline: A woman with no memories of her past (Jane Doe), is found naked in Times Square with her body fully covered in intricate tattoos. Her discovery sets off a vast and complex mystery that immediately ignites the attention of the FBI, which begins to follow the road map of her tattoos into a larger conspiracy of crime, while bringing her closer to discovering the truth about her identity.
imdb.title: Blindspot
plot: Jane Doe is found in Times Square with no memory and mysterious tattoos on her body.::Anonymous

A woman with no memories of her past (Jane Doe), is found naked in Times Square with her body fully covered in intricate tattoos. Her discovery sets off a vast and complex mystery that immediately ignites the attention of the FBI, which begins to follow the road map of her tattoos into a larger conspiracy of crime, while bringing her closer to discovering the truth about her identity.::Soumik Ghosh

A mysterious woman is found zipped up (alive) in a duffel bag, in Times Square. This Jane Doe has no memory of who she is or how she arrived there but is found to be nearly completely covered in cryptic tattoos. The FBI is called in to investigate, and the tattoos are revealed to be a mysterious 'treasure map' to preventing crime.::Derek MacGregor

A beautiful woman, with no memories of her past, is found naked in Times Square with her body fully covered in intricate tattoos. Her discovery sets off a vast and complex mystery that immediately ignites the attention of the FBI, which begins to follow the road map on her body into a larger conspiracy of crime, while bringing her closer to discovering the truth about her identity.::ahmetkozan
